These offices provide information relating to the Japanese economy and business as well as U.S.-Japan economic and trade relations and engage in various activities to promote trade and direct investment between Japan and the United States. JETRO offices in the United States are believed to serve similar functions as those of the United States Trade Center (of the United States Department of Commerce) established in Japan.
